root: ^You: All right, what are you here for?
^Patron: I need to renew my driver’s license.
^You: Do you have all your documents?

confirm: ^Patron: Thanks. I was worried I’d forgotten something.
^Patron: Then I’d have to come back and stand in line all over again.
^You: You’ll go over to Window C and get your picture taken.
missing: ^You: You need two. You only have one.
interlude: ^You: Hey, I don’t need your bank statements. Don’t forget them.
^You: No problem at all. You have a good day.
